name: Virtual Regatta Inshore
description:
Your fleet of inshore yachts includes ultra-fast foiling catamarans, dinghies or cutting-edge monohulls. The short format of racing is identical to the one used for real life competitions, such as the America’s Cup and the Star Sailors League, with a unique virtual umpire who applies the official rules of sailing.

Upgrade your boats with the points earned in each regatta, and compete for the official virtual sailing world champion title, awarded by the World Sailing Association.

Virtual Regatta Inshore: the best online sailing simulation since Virtual Skipper!

THE VIRTUAL REGATTA COMMUNITY

When sailing with Virtual Regatta, you become part of the world’s largest sailing community with more than one million active players.

Sail against the best: Virtual Regatta games are recognized by the greatest international skippers!

The largest virtual races bring together hundreds of thousands players: Vendee Globe, Volvo Ocean Race, America’s Cup, Star Sailors League, Transat Jacques Vabre, Route du Rhum, Barcolana, Cowes Week, Sydney Hobart, Fastnet, Tour de France à la voile, Spi Ouest France, Giraglia, Key West Race Week, Extreme Sailing Series, RC44
